name: Swords and Sandals Medieval
description: Gladiator, you are now a knight! The greatest gladiator series in the world, Swords and Sandals, has just gone medieval! Swords and Sandals moves into the middle ages in this action packed, turn-based combat RPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: 2000 Processor: 500 MHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 85 MB available space
